sentences.en: Children must not talk to strangers.
sentences.cn: 小孩子千万不要同陌生人说话。

sentences.en: He is no stranger to controversy.
sentences.cn: 他是个颇具争议的人物。

sentences.en: He is no stranger to property.
He looked at the stranger with distrust.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑地打量着那个陌生人.

sentences.en: If a stranger stops you, just wind the window down a fraction.
sentences.cn: 如果有陌生人拦你的车，把车窗摇下一点点就行。

sentences.en: It's hard for a stranger to make friends in this town.
sentences.cn: 外地人在这个城里很难交朋友.

sentences.en: No one knew the antecedents of the mysterious stranger.
sentences.cn: 谁也不知道那个神秘陌生人的身世.

sentences.en: She could not overcome her distrust of the stranger.
sentences.cn: 她无法消除对那位陌生人的怀疑.

sentences.en: She is not a stranger to misfortune.
sentences.cn: 她对不幸的经历并不陌生.

sentences.en: Sorry, I don't know where the bank is. I'm a stranger here myself.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我不知道银行在哪儿。我不是本地人。

sentences.en: The child made off when he saw a stranger.
sentences.cn: 那小孩看见生人便急忙跑掉了.

sentences.en: The dog jumped on the stranger.
sentences.cn: 这条狗突然向陌生人猛扑过去.

sentences.en: The soldiers had orders to permit no stranger through.
sentences.cn: 士兵们接到命令不许任何陌生人通过.

sentences.en: The stranger asked me to direct him to the station.
sentences.cn: 这位陌生人要我指示他去火车站的方向.

sentences.en: The stranger's question surprised me so that I temporarily lost my tongue.
sentences.cn: 那陌生人的询问使我大吃一惊,一时之间连话都说不出来了.

sentences.en: You're quite a stranger -- it's ten years since I last saw you.
sentences.cn: 你真是稀客-我们有十年不见面了.

words.tran_cn: 陌生；冷淡；[高能] 奇异性
移民,外国人,访问者,生手,入侵者,讨厌的人

phrases.tran_cn: (幽默)嘿，稀客！（用于与很长时间没有见面的人打招呼）

trans.tran_en: someone that you do not know
